text: ql -ayha alrswl-: la aqdr ealaa jalb khayr linafsi wala dafe sharun yahilu biha 'iilaa ma sha' allh, walaw kunt 'aelam alghayb lfelt al'asbab alty 'aelam 'anaha tkththir li almasalih walmnafe, wlattaqyt ma yakun min alsharu qabl 'an yqe, ma 'ana 'iilaa rasul allah arslny 'ilykm, akhwwif min eqabh, wabshr bthwabh qwmana yusadiqun bany rasul allh, wayaemalun bshreh
